GK16visa02cu:5_0: samprati kāvyalakṣaṇayorvākyarasayoḥ svarūpajijñāsāyāṃ prathamoddiṣṭaṃ vākyaṃ dvitīyaparicchedena
GK16visa02cu:10: padoccayasyaitadabhāve 'pi vākyatve “vahninā siñciti” ityādyapi vākyaṃ syāt /
GK16visa02cu:13: (vi, ka) vākyaṃ rasātmakaṃ kāvyamityuktatvāt vākyalakṣaṇaṃ vaktumāha---vākyasvarūpamiti /
GK16visa02cu:14: bādhābhāvo bādhamātrābhāvatve bādhajñānābhāvaḥ, tu bādhite bādhājñāne śābdabodhānupapatteḥ /
GK16visa02cu:27: tena gauraśva ityādau daivādaśveti jijñāsāsattve 'pi nākāṅkṣā /
GK16visa02cu:28: caitrasya bhrātā gṛhaṃ gacchatītyādau caitrasya na gṛhe ākāṅkṣā udeti bhrātari janitānvayabodhāt /
GK16visa02cu:31: vimalajale 'nvitāyā api nadyāḥ kacchasya sambandhikatvenopasthiteḥ nadīrūpe sambandhini tātparyyaśāt kacchānvayārthamapi kacche jijñāsa udeti iti na tatrāvyāptiḥ /
GK16visa02cu:32: vahninā siñcatītyatra tu karaṇatāyāḥ kāryaṃ vitā anupapattyā seke tat kāryye udeti eva ākāṅkṣā iti bodhyam /
GK16visa02cu:34: anyathā anākāṅkṣitasya kālikasambandhasya vahnikaraṇatāsekayorapi sattvād yogyatā syāt /
GK16visa02cu:41: etadabhāve yogyatāyā abhāve 'pi gaurityādīnāṃ parasparamākāṅkṣāvirahiṇāṃ padānāṃ pratītiparyyavasānaviraha ityeva viśādayatiśroturjijñāsā iti /
GK16visa02cu:44: etadabhāvāt gauraśvaḥ puruṣo hastītyatra ca nānvayabodhaḥ /
GK16visa02cu:48: iti vākyam ekadā anvayabodhejanite na anvayabodhāntarajanakam (kā-pra-ṭīdṛviśvanātha) /
GK16visa02cu:51: kevalaṃ kriyāśravaṇe bodhābhāvocca kārakasya (prathamaṃ karttuḥ tataḥ karmaprabhṛtīnāṃ)
GK16visa02cu:54: nirākāṅkṣasya vākyatve “gauraśvaḥ puruṣo istī” ityādīnāmapa vākyatvaṃ syāt /
GK16visa02cu:58: atra cākāṅkṣābhāvādeva ākāṅkṣitasambandhe bādhaviraharūpā yogyataiva nāsti;
GK16visa02cu:64: buddhivicchede 'pi vākyatve idānīmuccāritasya devadattaśabdasya dinātnaro ccāritena gacchatīti padena saṅgatiḥ syāt /
GK16visa02cu:68: āsattilakṣaṇamāha--yat padabuvdyavyavadhānena yat padabuddhistenaiva saha tasyāsattirityarthaḥ /
GK16visa02cu:71: nirarthakena vyavadhāne tu astyevā'sattiḥ--yathā“sa vai gacchati“ityatra vaikārastu nirarthako 'pi prāmāṇikaprayukta eva bodhyaḥ /
GK16visa02cu:77: tatrāsattyabhāvaṃ darśayati--buddhivicchede 'pīti--naca tatra pūrvoccāritapadārthasmṛtiryadyasti tadeṣvata eva tatra vākyatvaṃ,
GK16visa02cu:79: śabdabodhajanakatvasyāsattilakṣaṇe 'praveśena tatpadasmṛtyabhāvena śābdabodhājanakatayā vākye tatrātivyāptipradarśanasya aucityādeva /
GK16visa02cu:85_0: nanu bādhajñānābhāvarūpāyā yogyatāyā jijñāsārūpāyā ākāṅkṣāyāścātmārthavṛttitvāt kathaṃ
GK16visa02cu:85_1: padoccayasya tadyuktatvam ityata āha--ākāṅkṣāyogyatayoriti---upacāro viṣayatāsambandhena vṛttiḥ /
GK16visa02cu:86: sā ca bādhavirahasya pratiyogino bāghajñānasya viṣaye padoccaye tad viṣayatā sākṣādeva /
GK16visa02cu:101: saṃhatya sametya vākyamahāvākyayorityādiṣu pratyekaṃ vyavaccheda ityanvayaḥ /
GK16visa02cu:102: sākāṅkṣāni anekapadāni, yathā devadatto daṇḍena gām /
GK16visa02cu:103: anekavākyāni ca saṃhatya samuditārthabodhānārtham itaravākyasāpekṣāṇi prabandheṣu prasiddhani /
GK16visa02cu:104: tathābhūtānāṃ hi padānāṃ vākyānāṃ ca viśakalitānekārthabodhana eva bhaṭṭamate sāmarthyaṃ natvekārthabodhane /
GK16visa02cu:111: dvayorapi lakṣaṇakathane ākāṅkṣāsattvāt mahāvākyalakṣaṇe 'pi yogyatādikaṃ viśeṣaṇamityāha---yogyatākāṅkṣeti /
GK16visa02cu:112: tatrārdrakāṣṭhe vahnirjvalati tena siñcitītyatra mahāvākyatvāpattyā tadvāraṇāya yogyatāyāḥ,
GK16visa02cu:117: sūnyaṃ vāsagṛhamityādi---atra sarvapadārthānāmeva uttaratra sākāṅkṣatvena kasyāpi svārthabodhasamāptyabhāvāt na mahāvākyatvam /
GK16visa02cu:129: ekaikārthavattvaṃ hi svasamasaṃkhyārthatvam; arthasya ekaikatvasya vaktumaśakyatvāt /
GK16visa02cu:130: na trividhā surā ityatra ekasurāśabdasya gauḍīpaiṣṭhīmādhvītrayabodhakatvāttatrāvyāptiriti vācyam,
GK16visa02cu:131: tatra gauḍī surā paiṣṭhī surāmādhvī surā ityevamāvṛttyaivānvayabodhasvīkaraṇe surāpadatrayasya svasamasaṃkhyārthabodhakatvenāvyaptyabhāvāt /
GK16visa02cu:132: na ca taitra-maitra-devadattāḥ sundarā ityatra ekasundarapadena sundaratritayābodhanāt tatrāvyāptiriti vācyam;
GK16visa02cu:134: na ca tathāpi trividhā surā ityatrāvyāptiriti vācyam arthatāvacchedakānekatve āvṛttereva svīkārāt /
GK16visa02cu:141: vibhaktyantasyaiva padatvasvīkārāt, nahi vibhaktiṃ vinā suddhapratipadikasya prayogārhatā /
GK16visa02cu:142: nacānanvitaikārthapade naiva padvāraṇamiti vācyam; abhihitānvayavāde tasyānanvitābhidhāyitvādeva /
GK16visa02cu:149: atra ca vākyasyāśvitānekārthabodhakatvādekārthabodhakatvenaiva tadvāraṇasambhave 'pi tad viśeṣaṇadānamanvitābhidhānavādo 'smabhirnādriyate ityabhiprayasūcanāyaiva ityavadheyam /
GK16visa02cu:154: (vi, ña) sākāṅkṣāneketi---sākāṅkṣāni anekāni padāni yatra tādṛśavākyānāṃ vyavaccheda ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa02cu:170: tathā ca prayogārhapadādeva nirarthaka-ka-ca-ṭa-ta-pādīnāṃ vāraṇaṃ sāyaditi cet, satyam /
GK16visa02cu:172: tataśca tadanupādāne vākyamahāvākyayorativyāptyāpattyā tadvāraṇāyānanvitetyasya dānāvaśmyabhāve tadanurodhena tadviśeṣasyārthasya bodhakatvamupādeyam /
GK16visa02cu:177: bahuvacanamavivakṣitaṃ tenaikasya varṇāsya dvayorapi ca parigrahaḥ evaṃ ca mayi sānugraho bhavetyatra akārasya ekavarṇasya vāsudevasambandhoktasya na padatvahāniḥ /
GK16visa02cu:180: artho vācyaśva lakṣyaśca vyaṅgyaśceti tridhā mataḥ // VisSd_2.2 //
GK16visa02cu:183: vyaṅgyo vyañjanayā tāḥ syustistraḥ śabdasya śaktayaḥ // VisSd_2.3 //
GK16visa02cu:190: (lo, u) tatrābhihitānvayavādināṃ mate vākyārtho 'pi padabhidheya iti vakṣyeta /
GK16visa02cu:191: ānvatābhidhānavādināṃ mate ca vākyābhidheyaḥ, lakṣyaśca padamātrasyārthaḥ /
GK16visa02cu:193: ye cānvitādayo lakṣye vākyārthe iti ūcuḥ tanmate tatparyyavṛttireva vākyārthabodhikā,
GK16visa02cu:195: nanu tatra gaṅgāyāṃ ghoṣa ityādau taṭārthabodhikā vakṣyamāṇalakṣaṇā vṛttiḥ /
GK16visa02cu:198: vyañjanāprastāve lakṣaṇāprastāve tu bhaṭṭamate “sā vṛttirvyañjanā nāma śabdasyārthādikasya ca'; iti vakṣyati /
GK16visa02cu:205: abhidheti abhidhīyate bodhyate iti yogārtha eva lakṣaṇam;
GK16visa02cu:206: tatra kasyārthasya bodhanāttādṛśo yogārtha ityatrāha saṃketiteti /
GK16visa02cu:210: evaṃ cāgṛhītavṛttikārthabodhikā vyañjanā kathaṃ vāriteti vācyam /
GK16visa02cu:213: lakṣaṇā tu śaktigrahottaraṃ bādhāvatāre satyeva gṛhyate /
GK16visa02cu:219: uttamavṛddhena madhyamavṛddhamuddiśya “gāmānaya” ityukte taṃ gavānayanapravṛttamupalabhya bālo 'sya vākyasya “sāsnādimatpiṇḍānayanamarthaḥ” iti prathamaṃ pratipadyate,
GK16visa02cu:220: anantaraṃ ca “gāṃ badhāna” “aśvamānaya” ityādāvāvāpodvāpābhyāṃ gośabdasya “sāsnādimānarthaḥ” ānayanapadasya ca “āharaṇamarthaḥ” iti saṃketamavadhārayati /
GK16visa02cu:223: (vi, ḍha) tatra vṛddhavyavahāradarśanārthaḥ saṃketagrahaḥ; tat prakāraṃ darśayati--uttameti /
GK16visa02cu:242: nanu tarhi vākyabhāgarūpeṣu padeṣu padārthabodhavyatirekeṇa bhinnavākyaniṣṭeṣu padeṣu kathamarthāvabodha ityata āha---anantaraṃ ceti /
GK16visa02cu:245: tathāpi yasya padarūpasya vākyabhāgasya bodhe yasyārthabhāgasyāvāpaḥ,
GK16visa02cu:246: yaduddhāre coddhārastasmen padārthe tasya padasya śaktirāvāpoddharadarśanenaivānugṛhītatayār'thāpattyāvagamyata iti /
GK16visa02cu:247: evaṃ cātra pakṣe pratyayānumānārthāpattibhiḥ pramāṇaiḥ saṃketagraha iti sūcitam /
GK16visa02cu:254: asya hyarthaḥ--śabdo gāmānaya ityādivākyam, vṛddhau prayojakaprayojyau, abhidheyo gavānayanādiḥ /
GK16visa02cu:256: anumiti śarīraṃ ca-yeyaṃ prayojya vṛddhasya pravṛttiḥ sā etadanuguṇabuddhi pūrvikā;
GK16visa02cu:262: śaktiṃ vācakavācyatvarūpaṃ sambandham anyathānupapattyā arthāt prayojakavṛddhapravṛtterjānāti /
GK16visa02cu:264: sāvācyā durupapādyeti śabdavyavahārecchede ityata āha--arthāpattyā ca iti /
GK16visa02cu:265: atra cakāreṇa bodhe tu śaktiṃ dūyātmikāmityasyā parāmarśaḥ /
GK16visa02cu:266: avabudhyate iti pāṭhe tvarthata eva tat parāmarśaḥ /
GK16visa02cu:268: gṛhītasaṃketavākyabhāgarūpasya tadarthadvayātmikāṃ śaktiṃ vācyavācakasambaddhām avāpoddhāradarśanānugṛhītatayā arthāpattyā jānātīti /
GK16visa02cu:280: yadāhuḥ--“sādṛśyaṃ dharmamātraṃ ca vaisādṛśyaṃ ca bhedataḥ“iti;
GK16visa02cu:284_1: pūrvāvadhāritasaṃketatayā prasiddhaiḥ padaiḥ samabhivyāhārat madhukarapadārtho bhramara
GK16visa02cu:286: tena gosadṛśo gavayaḥ kākavisadṛśaḥ kokila ityanayorupamānapramāṇena saṅketagrahaḥ sūcitaḥ kvacit śabdapramāṇa ityata āha---kvaciditi /
GK16visa02cu:290: taṃ ca saṅketitamarthaṃ bodhayantī śabdasya śaktyantarānantaritā
GK16visa02cu:295: lakṣaṇā hi abhidhāntaritaiva; vyañjanā yatra lakṣaṇā nāsti tatrābhidhāntaritā /
GK16visa02cu:298: agrimetyanena yannāmā yatra caitrādiḥ tannāmāviṣayatayāpi sa ityuktaprakārādāśrita caitretyādinānnā viṣayoderiva sāntarāyasaṃketitādvaitalakṣaṇaṃ sūcitam /
GK16visa02cu:304: prabhinneti-- atra madhupadaṃ pibatipadaṃ ca prasiddham /
GK16visa02cu:310: saṅketo gṛhyate jātau guṇadravyakriyāsu ca // VisSd_2.4 //
GK16visa02cu:313: śuklādayo hi gavādiraṃ sajātīyebhyaḥ kṛṣṇagavādibhyo vyāvartayanti /
GK16visa02cu:317: eṣveva hi vyakterupādhiṣu saṃketo gṛhyate, na vyaktauḥ ānantyavyabhicāradoṣāpātāt /
GK16visa02cu:320: (vi, ta) nanu saṃketitor'thaḥ kiṃ dharmo dharmo vā ityatrāha--saṅketiteti /
GK16visa02cu:323: etad rūpo yo vastudharmaḥ sa siddho nitya ityāha--siddho vastudharma iti---etanmeta guṇā api nityā eva---utpattivināśapratītistvāvirbhāvatirobhāvarūpaiva /
GK16visa02cu:324: guṇānāṃ viśeṣādhānaṃ grāhayati--suklādayohi iti--vyāvarttayanti vilakṣaṇatayā bodhayanti harihareti /
GK16visa02cu:326: tadaṅgīkarttṝṇāṃ mate tu ayamapi jātiśabda eva /
GK16visa02cu:328: kriyā iti--sādhyarūpāḥ janyarūpā mahāpralaye paramāṇūnāmapi niṣkriyatvena kriyāyā na nityatvam,
GK16visa02cu:335: yadi ca ekavyaktāveva saṃketagraha ityucyate tadāha---vyabhicāreti /
GK16visa02cu:336: yadvyaktau saṃketo gṛhītastatabhinnastatsajātīyavyaktāvapi svarūpodbodhāt kāraṇaṃ śaktigrahaṃ vināpi kāryyabodhād vyabhicārajoṣa ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa02cu:341_0: kecid vyaktyākṛtijātaya ityādīni matāntarāṇi parihṛtya sarveṣāṃ vāṅmayānā vyākaraṇamūlatvāt
GK16visa02cu:341_1: alaṅkāraprantheṣu ca prāyeṇa tadanugatatvenaiva vyavahārācca mahābhāṣyakāramatamāśrityāha---saṅketa iti /
GK16visa02cu:348: hetuṃ vināpi ayaṃ ḍitthaḥ ḍavittha ityādirūpeṇaṃ śṛṅgagrāhikayā vaktṛsaṃketena vyaktiṣu sānniveśitaḥ /
GK16visa02cu:349: sajātīyaśūnye ḍitthādyarthopasthāpakaḥ śabdaḥ saṃketasya viṣaya iti /
GK16visa02cu:352: iha ca dravyasyopādhiviṣayatvāsambhave 'pi tatsaṃjñāyāḥ upādhitvena tattvamupacārāt /
GK16visa02cu:353: ḍitthādyarthe cānantyavyabhicārābhāvāt upādhiṃ vinaiva sambhavati vācyavācakasambandhasamayagraha iti nopādhirapekṣyate /
GK16visa02cu:356: ata eva guṇadravyakiyāsu ceti dravyakiyāsu ceti dravyasya saṃketaviṣayatvamuktaṃ,
GK16visa02cu:358: ānantyeti-vyaktīnāmanantatvāt pratyekaṃ ca rekhoparekhādisaṃsthānaviśeṣasya ca bhinnatvāt tatrāśakyaḥ sabhayagraha iti /
GK16visa02cu:359: nanvevaṃ gavādipadena saṃketitatvāt jātāvantarhitāyāṃ kathaṃ vyaktipratītiḥ /
GK16visa02cu:362: tatrānupayogitayā vyakteḥ śabdabodhitatvaṃ vinā śābde 'nvaye praveśāsambhava iti jātyabhidhāyake śabde tadbonārthaṃ vyañjanaiva vṛttirūpāsitumuciteti rahasyam /
GK16visa02cu:364: kiṃ ca saṃśayāpagamārtham upāttāni padāni saṃsargasya mukhyāṅgaṃ saṃsṛjyamānaṃ vyaktirūpaṃ sākṣānna bodhayanti,
GK16visa02cu:370: sāmānyasya sarvaviśeṣatvāṅgīkārāt saṅketena sarvaviśeṣyajñāne tu sarvasyāpi sarvajñatvāpattiḥ /
GK16visa02cu:371: prathamoddeśakāle tu sarvavyaktīnāṃ sāmmukhyāṅgīkāratayā sāmānyaliṅgitayā pratyaṅgīkāre punarādhunikasyāpi svalakṣaṇasya prathamopadeśakālavat sammukhīkāreṇaiva pratītiḥ syāt /
GK16visa02cu:372: tataścānvayopapādikāyāḥ sākṣāt pratīteḥ padasya śaktyantaraṃ vinā kiṃ bījabhityalaṃ bahunā /
GK16visa02cu:379: (vi, tha) lakṣyo lakṣaṇayā grāhyaḥ ityuktatvāllakṣaṇāyā lakṣaṇamāha---mukhyārtheti /
GK16visa02cu:381: gaṅgāyāṃ ghoṣa ityādau mukhyārthasya gaṅgāyā abādhāt;
GK16visa02cu:385: na kevalaṃ mukhyārthabādhajñānādhīnaṃ tajjñānaṃ, api tu rūḍheḥ prayojanād vāpīti /
GK16visa02cu:387: tathā ca etattritayajñāpitayā yā vṛttyā mukhyārthādanyo mukhyārthasambaddhor'thaḥ pratīyate asau śaktirvṛttirlakṣaṇetyarthaḥ /
GK16visa02cu:391: yā tu vyaṅgyārthe tātparyyakhyā vṛttirdhvanikenoktā yā ca padārthadvayasaṃsarge tātparyyākhyā vṛttiḥ prācīvanaiyāyikairuktā sā naitāttritaya-jñāpitā;
GK16visa02cu:394: tena chatriṇo gacchanti kuntāḥ praviśantītyatra mukhyārthayoḥ chatrikuntayoḥ gamanapraveśānvayasattve 'pi niruktamukhyārthabādhasattvānnāvyāptiḥ /
GK16visa02cu:396: atra ca tātparyyaviṣayatvānupādāne tu chatrikuntayorgamanapraveśānvayasya mukhyatāvacchedakaccha tritvakuntābhyāmutpadyamānatvāt--tatrāvyāptyāpatteḥ /
GK16visa02cu:398: tātparyyaviṣayasya chatrisārthavāhino gamanānvayasya kuntinaḥ praveśānvayasya ca lakṣatāvacchedakacchatrisārthavāhitvakuntitvābhyāmupapatteḥ /
GK16visa02cu:400: tena ghaṭapadasya nīlaghaṭe lakṣaṇāyāṃ tasya ghaṭanyatvābhāve 'pi nāvyāptiḥ /
GK16visa02cu:403: (lo, e) atheti-athābhidhānantaraṃ lakṣaṇoddeśakramaprāptā lakṣaṇā nirūṇyata iti śeṣaḥ /
GK16visa02cu:404: mukhyārtheti---mukhyārtho gaṅgādiśabdasya jalamayādiḥ tasya ca ādheyapadārthāntare 'nvayānupapattau,
GK16visa02cu:405: na ca yataḥ kutaścit yadeva tadeva lakṣyate-atiprasaṅgādityata āha---tadyukta iti /
GK16visa02cu:406: tena mukhyārthena yena kenacit sambandhena sambaddhaḥ anyor'thaḥ taṭādiḥ yayā śabdaśaktyā pratīyate bodhyate;
GK16visa02cu:407: na ca sambandhamātrādapi lakṣyārthapratītiḥ api prasaṅgādeva ityāha--rūḍheḥ prayojanād vā /
GK16visa02cu:408: kvacid rūḍheḥ anādivṛddhavyavahāraprasiddheḥ kvacit pāvanatvādyatiśayaṃ prayojanamuddiśya /
GK16visa02cu:410: evaṃ cātra lakṣaṇāyāṃ hetutrayaṃ mukhyārthabādaḥ; ca tat sambandhaḥ,
GK16visa02cu:414: ñasaṃbhavan yayā śabdaśaktyā svasaṃyuktān puruṣādīn pratyāyayati,
GK16visa02cu:415: yayā ca “gaṅgāyāṃ ghoṣaḥ” ityādau gaṅgādiśabdo jalamayādirūpārthavācakatvātprakṛte 'saṃbhavan svasya sāmīpyādisaṃbandhasaṃbandhinaṃ taṭādiṃ bodhayati,
GK16visa02cu:416: sā śabdasyārpitā svābhaviketarā īśvarānudbhāvitā vā śaktirlakṣaṇā nāma /
GK16visa02cu:418: uttaratra “gaṅgātaṭe ghoṣaḥ” iti pratipādanālabhyasya śītatvapāvanatvātiśayasya bodhanarūpaṃ prayojanam /
GK16visa02cu:419: hetuṃ vināpi yasya kasyacitsaṃbandhino lakṣaṇo 'tiprasaṅgaḥ syāt, ityuktam--
GK16visa02cu:433: rūḍhiprayojanaśūnyā, lakṣaṇā tu neyārtha iti vakṣyate, sā ca kāvye doṣa eva /
GK16visa02cu:436: (lo, ai) udāharaṇadarśanapūrvakaṃ kārikārthaṃ vṛttyā viśadayati--kaliṅga iti /
GK16visa02cu:437: svārthe vācyarūpe 'sambhavan deśaviśeṣādirūpārthasyācetanatayā sāhasikādyarthenānvayānupapattyānupapadyamānaprayogaḥ kuta ityāha--jalamayādirūpārthasya vācakatvāt /
GK16visa02cu:438: ayamarthaḥ--gaṅgadiśabdo yasmāt jalamayādirūpamevārthaṃ samayasmaraṇākātaraḥ san smārayati,
GK16visa02cu:439: tasmād vācyarūpasya jalādyarthasya ghoṣādyarthena sahānvayānupapattyā prakṛte vācakatvena tasya prayogo na ghaṭata iti /
GK16visa02cu:441: sambandhasyānvayasya, taddhi taṭaśabdārthaṃ yayā bodhayatīti sambandhaḥ /
GK16visa02cu:446: tadanayorekatarā svābhāvikī, itarā īśvarānudbhāviteti dvidhā vyākhyātam /
GK16visa02cu:447: pūrvatra kaliṅgaḥ sāhasika ityatra, uttaratra gaṅgāyāṃ ghoṣa ityādau /
GK16visa02cu:448: gaṅgātaṭa ityādau taṭasya gaṅgāśabdena pratipādanāt gaṅgātādātmyapratīteḥ gaṅgārthaniṣṭānāṃ naṭārthaniṣṭhātiśayitānāṃ śītatvapāvanatvādīnāṃ pratītirlakṣaṇāyāḥ phalamityarthaḥ /
GK16visa02cu:452: kuśāṃllātīti vyutpattilabhyaḥ kuśagrāhirūpo mukhyor'thaḥ prakṛte 'saṃbhavan vivecakatvādisādharmyasambandhasambandhinaṃ dakṣarūpamarthaṃ bodhayati /
GK16visa02cu:456: vyutpattilabhyasya mukhyārthatve “gauḥ śete” ityatrāpi lakṣaṇā syāt /
GK16visa02cu:457: “gamerḍeḥ” (uṇādi--2-67) iti gamadhatorḍepratyayena vyutpāditasya gośabdasya śayanakāle prayogāt /
GK16visa02cu:462: dakṣasyaiva mukhyārthatvāditi---bhūriprayogeṇa dakṣatvasya laghutvena ca tadacchinnasyaiva śakyatvena mukhyatvādityarthaḥ /
GK16visa02cu:465: tathā ca tenaiva nimittena śabdasya pravṛttestadavacchinna eva mukhyārtha ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa02cu:467: yathā dakṣe śaktasya kuśalapadasya gṛhaviśeṣe śaktasya maṇḍapapadasya ca daivakarmaṇi kuśala iti rogī maṇḍapa iti ca tayodavakarmarogipadasamabhivyāharasya tātparyyagrāhakatvāt /
GK16visa02cu:468: gauḥ śete ityatra śete iti suptagoḥ- pradarśanārthameva /
GK16visa02cu:469: gaurastīti suptagavi prayoge 'pi lakṣaṇā syāditi bodhyam /
GK16visa02cu:473: iti sūtreṇa vadataḥ pāṇineḥ ayamabhiprāyo yaduṇādipratyayānāṃ prāyikyeva vyutpattiriti,
GK16visa02cu:475: tathā ca gotvenaiva rūpeṇa rūḍhiśaktyā gopadaṃ svapadagacchad gosādhāraṇyena prayujyate,
GK16visa02cu:481: (lo, o) kecittviti---prakṛte karmaṇi kuśala ityanenāpi arthatayāsambhavan anupapattirbādhitaḥ /
GK16visa02cu:483: gośabdo yadyapi gamanārtho vyutpattinimittaṃ tathāpi gotvāpattikiyaiva pravṛttinimittam ata eva gacchatyāgacchati gavi gośabdaprayogaḥ /
GK16visa02cu:484: yadāha, ghaṭaśabdaprasaṃge“ghaṭaṃna ca tadātmatvāpattirūpā kiyā matā'; iti /
GK16visa02cu:486: --tayoḥ rūḍhiprayojanābhyāṃ dvidhoktayorlakṣaṇayorbhedān viśeṣān bhidyate 'nena iti bheda iti vyutpattyā /
GK16visa02cu:499: atra tātparyyaviṣayatvaṃ yadi anvayaviśeṣaṇaṃ na kriyate tadā chatriṇe gacchanti kuntāḥ praviśanti ityādiṣu avyāptiḥ syāt;
GK16visa02cu:509: anayorhi śvetādibhiḥ kuntādibhiścācetanatayā kevalairdhāvanapraveśanakriyayoḥ kartṛtayānvayamalabhamānairetatsiddhaye ātmasambandhino 'śvādayaḥ puruṣāda yaścākṣipyante /
GK16visa02cu:515: kuntā iti kuntavanta ityarthaḥ anayormukhyārthānvayabādhaṃ darśayati /
GK16visa02cu:517: śvetādibhirityādipadāt nīlādiguṇānāṃ kuntādibhirityādi padāt astrāntarāṇāṃ ca parigrahaḥ /
GK16visa02cu:520: vastutastu chatriṇo gacchanti ityatra chatriṇaścetanatve 'pi tātparyyaviṣayacchatryanvayattyālābha eva sarvasādhāraṇo mukhyārthabādho bodhyaḥ /
GK16visa02cu:521: aśvādaya ityādipadacchvetagavādeḥ, puruṣādayaḥ ityādipadāt kuntadhārivat itarasya parigrahaḥ /
GK16visa02cu:523: pūrvatra prayojanābhāvādrūḍhiḥ, uttaratra tu kuntādīnāmatigahanatvaṃ prayojanam /
GK16visa02cu:542: iha khalvabhidhayā bodhitasyāpi śvetakuntādyarthasya punaḥ puruṣāderviśeṣaṇatayā lakṣaṇīyatvena upādānamiti /
GK16visa02cu:551: atra arpaṇamityatra paratraiveti śeṣaḥ, svasya paramātraviṣayatā ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa02cu:553: upādānalakṣaṇāyāṃ tu mukhyārthasyāpi viṣayatā iti bhedaḥ /
GK16visa02cu:555: tathā ca vākyārthe bodhye parasya amukhyārthasya anvayasiddhaye anvayabodhāya yasyā lakṣaṇāyāḥ svasya arpaṇaṃ paramātraviṣayatā;
GK16visa02cu:567: atra kaliṅgaḥ sāhasika iti na pāṭhaḥ /
GK16visa02cu:568: kintu kaliṅgaḥ sāhasaṃ karoti ityeva pāṭhaḥ /
GK16visa02cu:570: ubhayatraiva mukhyārthaṃ kaliṅgarūpaṃ deśaṃ pravāharūpāṃ saṅgā ca vihāya taddeśasthapuruṣatattīrayoḥ parayoranvayaprabodhāya puruṣatari-rūpa-mātra-viṣayatā lakṣaṇāyāḥ /
GK16visa02cu:575: kaliṅgagaṅgāśabdau ityatra kaliṅgagaṅgāśabādapadaṃ tanniṣṭhalakṣaṇādvayaparaṃ yathā vyākhyātārthanusāreṇa bodhyam /
GK16visa02cu:582: “apakṛtaṃ bahu tatra kimucyate sujanatā prathitā bhavatā param /
GK16visa02cu:583: vidadhadīdṛśameva sadā sakhe ! sukhitamāssva tataḥ śaradāṃ śatam” //
GK16visa02cu:592: tvayā bahu upakṛtaṃ tatra kimucyata ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa02cu:599: kintu apakāradurjanatvalakṣaṇayoḥ phalaṃ sambodhyasya kauṭilyaṃ duḥ khitalakṣaṇāyāstu kauṭilyaphalatvam /
GK16visa02cu:602: apakārārdānāmityādiśabdena durjanatvaduḥ khitatve upakṛtādayaṃ ityādiśabdena sujanatvasukhitatve /
GK16visa02cu:616: viṣayiṇā anigīrṇasya viṣayasya tenaiva saha tādātmyapratītikṛtsāropā /
GK16visa02cu:622: tasya anigārṇṇasya anācchāditasya arthāt svavācakanāmapadena uktasya anyatādātmyaṃ śakyārthābhedaḥ /
GK16visa02cu:624: nigīrṇṇasya viśiṣya svāvācaka-nāmapadena anuktasya tu sādhyavasānikā matetyarthaḥ /
GK16visa02cu:630: ākhyātena lakṣyārthasyoktau tat pratīteḥ; taccāgre darśayiṣyate /
GK16visa02cu:632: (lo, i) evaṃ caturvidhāpi lakṣaṇā pratyekaṃ sāropā sādhyavasānā ityaṣṭavidhetyāha--āropeti /
GK16visa02cu:635: evaṃ svaśabdārthanāmnā gatārthe 'pi sphuṭīkaraṇāya lakṣaṇena nirddiśati--viṣayasyeti /
GK16visa02cu:651: atra sarvanāmneti---kāvyaprakāśe tu sarvanāmnā lakṣyārthanirddeśe viśiṣya svāvācakakuntādipadenānupādānāt sādhyavasānaiva setyuktam /
GK16visa02cu:655: svasamaveta ityanena samavāyarūpasya lakṣaṇāhetoḥ svasambandhasya nigaraṇaṃ śvetaguṇa āropyamāṇaḥ /
GK16visa02cu:656: prayojana ityanantaraṃ pūrvoktā upādānalakṣaṇā sāropeti anuṣajyate /
GK16visa02cu:680: (vi, va) kaliṅgaḥ puruṣa iti---atra puruṣapadena lakṣyārthopādānāt anigīrṇṇatvam /
GK16visa02cu:685: āyuridamiti sādhyavasānāyamavyabhicāra iti dvayoḥ pṛthak prayojanadvayamuktam /
GK16visa02cu:686: kāryyakāraṇabhāvarūpasambandhena sāropāṃ lakṣaṇāmuktvā sambandhāntarairapi tāṃ darśayati---rājarkāyetīti /
GK16visa02cu:687: atra asāvitipadena lakṣyārthe puruṣe nirddiṣṭe rājño 'bhedāropāt sāropā /
GK16visa02cu:700: asyāścaturṣviti rūḍhiprayojanadvaye upādānalakṣaṇādvayaṃ taddvaye lakṣaṇalakṣaṇādvayaṃ ceti sādhyavasānāyaścatvārobhedāḥ /
GK16visa02cu:703: iti yaddvayamudāhṛtaṃ rūḍhau lakṣaṇalakṣaṇāyāḥ “kaliṅgaḥ sāhasaṃ karoti';
GK16visa02cu:704: iti prayojane lakṣaṇalakṣaṇāyāṃ tu rājakīye puruṣe gacchati “rājāsau gacchati';
GK16visa02cu:705: iti yadudāhṛtaṃ tatra idaṃ padatyāgena udāharaṇamityata etāni catvāri sādhyavasānāyā udāharaṇānītyarthaḥ /
GK16visa02cu:707: eteṣu caturṣu hi kartryā khyātenaiva kartṛlakṣyārthasya upasthāpanāt nāmapadena tu anupasthānānnigīrṇṇatā /
GK16visa02cu:710: gaṅgāyāṃ ghoṣa iti tu lakṣaṇalakṣaṇodāharaṇaṃ yaddarśetaṃ tattu na sādhyavasānodāharaṇam /
GK16visa02cu:712: evaṃ ca rūḍhau lakṣaṇalakṣaṇedāharaṇaṃ kaliṅga ityādikaṃ yaduktaṃ tatra sāhasika iti prāmādikaḥ pāṭhaḥ /
GK16visa02cu:713: nāmapadena sāhasika ityanena lakṣyārthasya puruṣasyopādānāt sāropatvena sādhyavasānatvābhāvāt /
GK16visa02cu:714: kintu kaliṅgaḥ sāhasaṃ karoti ityeva tatra pāṭhaḥ /
GK16visa02cu:715: itthamupādānalakṣaṇālakṣaṇalakṣaṇayoḥ rūḍhiprayojanahetukatvena caturvidhayoḥ sāropāsādhyavasānikārūpatvena dvaiguṇyāt aṣṭavidhatvam /
GK16visa02cu:718_0: evamārope rūḍhiprayojanayorudāharaṇe catuṣṭayaṃ darśayitvā viṣayavyāptyarthaṃ sambandhabhedena
GK16visa02cu:718_1: udāharaṇānyāha--yathā vetyādi---rājāsau ityatra pūrvavat adaḥ śabdena viṣayaprakaṭanam /
GK16visa02cu:720: atra hastāvayave 'gre 'pi hastaśabdaprayogaḥ, ekadeśadāhe 'pi grāmo dagdha iti vat /
GK16visa02cu:721: atra idaṃśabdo rājā asau ityatra ca adaḥ śabdavat /
GK16visa02cu:731: sādṛśyetarasambandhāḥ kāryyakāraṇabhāvādirūpāḥ pūrvadarśitāḥ sakalā aṣṭavidhā api suddhāḥ śuddhaparibhāṣitāḥ /
GK16visa02cu:732: sādṛśyasambandhāttu tā aṣṭavidhā gauṇyaḥ sādṛśyaghaṭakarūpaśakyaguṇayogarūpayogārthena gauṇyo gauṇīparibhāṣitā ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa02cu:736: evamaṣṭavidhāpi lakṣaṇā pratyekaṃ śuddhā gauṇī ceti ṣoḍaśaprakāreti darśayati---sādṛśyetareti /
GK16visa02cu:744: (vi, sa) pūrvoktodāharaṇānyeva iti---śveto dhāvatītyādīni, indrārthā sthūṇā ityantāni sakalāni eva /
GK16visa02cu:749: atra tailaśabdastilabhavasneharūpaṃ mukhyārthamupādāyaiva sārṣapādiṣu sneheṣu vartate /
GK16visa02cu:753: etānīti---atra tailaśabdasya tilabhavastrehamātravācakatvāt prakṛte tasya kevalasya sukhamayatvādivivakṣaṇat mukhyārthabādaḥ;
GK16visa02cu:754: prayojanābhāvāt rūḍiḥ upādānalakṣaṇātvaṃ mukhyārthamupādāyaiva iti vṛttyā smāritam /
GK16visa02cu:755: streheṣu varttata ityanena ubhayoḥ streharūpatvāt sādṛśyalakṣaṇaḥ sambandhaḥ /
GK16visa02cu:759: rājakumāreṣu tatsadṛśeṣu ca gacchatsu“ete rājakumārā gacchanti” /
GK16visa02cu:764: tasya cikkaṇatākāritvena sādṛśyāśrayaṃ śakyalakṣyobhayamevātra taila śabdārtha ityato mukhyopādānam /
GK16visa02cu:767: ubhayatraiva etāni ete iti sarvanāmapadena lakṣyārthopādānāt tatra śakyārthatādātmyāropācca sāropā lakṣaṇā /
GK16visa02cu:777: kintu śakyārthāvyāvarttakena śakyalakṣyasādhāraṇyena sukhapadena lakṣyārthopasthāpanāttasyācchādanarūpā nigīrṇṇatā /
GK16visa02cu:789: atra duḥ khadāyitvena kaṇṭakasadṛśaḥ gauḍendro lakṣyārthaḥ svaśabdenaivopāttaḥ /
GK16visa02cu:804: takṣyārthasya kenāpi padena anupasthāpanāt, prathamaṃ tatra śakyatādātmyāropānupapatteḥ /
GK16visa02cu:805: kintu rājñā kaṇṭakaṃ śodhyate, ityeva pāṭhaḥ /
GK16visa02cu:806: tatra karmākhyātenopasthāpite śodhye karmaṇi vaurīṇi prathamāntakaṇṭapadaśakyārthasya tādātmyāropāt /
GK16visa02cu:821: gaurvāhīka ityādietasmin udāharaṇe yathā prayojane lakṣaṇalakṣaṇā sāropā gauṇī /
GK16visa02cu:823: evaṃ gaurjalpatītyatrāpi prayojane lakṣaṇalakṣaṇā sādhyavasānā gauṇī /
GK16visa02cu:832: (vi, ga) atra keciditi---svārtho gotvaṃ tatsahacāriṇa ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa02cu:835: tathā ca jaḍatvena rūpeṇa vāhīkaḥ śaktyaiva, jaḍo vāhīka iti pratītiriti tatsiddhāntaḥ /
GK16visa02cu:837: ayaṃ ca doṣaḥ tat siddhāntānavakalenādeva dharme lakṣaṇayā eva dharmiṇi śaktigrāhakatvasya taiḥ siddhāntitatvāt /
GK16visa02cu:838: gośabdārtheti---sakṛduccāritasya śabdasya sakṛdarthabodhanena śabdavirityā abhidhāyā api virateriti bhāvaḥ /
GK16visa02cu:841: samprati pūrvapakṣanirāsapūrvakaṃ gauṇyā vṛtterlakṣaṇāyāmantarbhāvaṃ darśayan ekatrāpi udāharaṇe vipratipattinirāsena sarvamapi sāmañjasyaṃ bhaviṣyatītyāha--atreti /
GK16visa02cu:843: lakṣyante lakṣaṇayā bodhyante te tatra lakṣitā guṇāḥ;
GK16visa02cu:844: cakāreṇa na khalu teṣāṃ lakṣitatvamātreṇa viśrantiriti,
GK16visa02cu:846: punarutthānābhāvāt śabdabuddhikarmmaṇāṃ viramya vyāpārābhāva iti nyāyāt,
GK16visa02cu:850: kintu svārthasahacāriguṇasājātyena vāhīkārthagatā guṇā eva lakṣyante /
GK16visa02cu:854: (vi, gha) guṇā eva lakṣyanta iti---vāhīkapratītistvākṣepāditi bhāvaḥ /
GK16visa02cu:859: sājātyena sambandhena vāhīkagatā guṇā jāḍyamāndyādaya eva ; atraivakāreṇa guṇino vyavacchedaḥ /
GK16visa02cu:860: lakṣyante lakṣaṇayā bodhyante tat samanantaroktaṃ matāntaramapi /
GK16visa02cu:889: vastutastu jātiśaktivāde jātyavinābhāvalabhyāyā vyakteḥ śābdabodhapraveśavadatrāpi tathātve bādhakābhāvāt /
GK16visa02cu:897: tasmādatra gośabdo mukhyayāvṛttyā vāhīkaśabdena sahānvayamalabhamāno 'jñatvādisādharmyasaṃbandhādvāhīkārthaṃ lakṣayati /
GK16visa02cu:901: (vi, ca) tathā hi gośabdasya vāhīkagatajāḍyamāndyādi guṇor'thaḥ /
GK16visa02cu:912: etasyā gauṇyākhyāyā vṛttermukhyārthabādhāditritayahetukatvāt lakṣaṇāyāmantarbhāvaḥ sphuṭa eva ityāśayaḥ /
GK16visa02cu:914_0: gaurvāhīka ityatra govāhīkaśabdayostādātmyapratītyā vāhīke jāḍyādyatiśayaḥ pratīyate
GK16visa02cu:919: ata eva kvacit taṭādau gaṅgadisambandhāt kiñcit śetyādikamastvevaṃ,
GK16visa02cu:920: kintu gaṅgāśabdena pratipādane gaṅgātvapratītau tatśaityādikamādhikaṃ pratīyate /
GK16visa02cu:921: vāhīke punargoniṣṭānāṃ guṇānāṃ kadācinna sambhavaḥ, kintu tatsajātīyānām /
GK16visa02cu:922: kiñca gaurvāhīka ityukte 'pi pratipattuḥ sarvathā nābhedapratipattiḥ,
GK16visa02cu:924: taduktaṃ śārīrikamīmāṃsāvyākhyāne vācaspatimiśraiḥ---“api ca paraśabdaḥ paratra lakṣyamāṇaguṇayogena varttata';
GK16visa02cu:925: iti yatra prayoktṛpratipattroḥ sampratipattiḥ sa gauṇaḥ,
GK16visa02cu:930: upacāro hi nāmātyantaṃ viśakalitayoḥ śabdayoḥ sādṛśyātiśayamahimnā bhedapratītisthaganamātram /
GK16visa02cu:932: śuklapaṭayostu nātyantaṃ bhedapratītiḥ, tasmādevamādiṣu śuddhaiva lakṣaṇā /
GK16visa02cu:937: nanu tatrāpi samānavibhaktikatvavaśādāyurghṛtayoḥ prathamabhedopacāro 'steyeva ityata āha---upacāro hīti /
GK16visa02cu:942: (lo, a) etadabhipretya uktaprakāreṇa lakṣaṇāviśeṣaṇayorgauṇaśuddhayorbhedaṃ darśayatiiyaṃ ceti /
GK16visa02cu:950: prayojane yā aṣṭabhedā lakṣaṇā daśitāstāḥ prayojanarūpavyaṅgyasya gūḍhāgūḍhatayā pratyekaṃ dvidhā bhūtvā ṣoḍhaśa bhedāḥ /
GK16visa02cu:962: prayojane yā aṣṭabhedā darśitā iti ṣoḍaśasu rūḍhāvaṣṭau prayojane tvaṣṭāviti darśatatvāt /
GK16visa02cu:968: āviṣkarotīti--upadeśakatvasya gurudharmatvena yauvanamade tadbādhāt iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16visa02cu:970: kāvyaprakāśe tu śikṣādānameva lakṣyārthastatrānāyāsa eva prayojanamabhidheyavat sarvajanavedyam /
GK16visa02cu:971: taddhi prayonajamupadeśasya vākyārthasya dharmo lakṣyārthe śikṣādāne pratīyate---upadeśāt śikṣāyāṃ cānāyāsaḥ sarvajanavedya eva iti tadabhiprāyaḥ /
GK16visa02cu:977: ābhyāmeva vyaṅgyasya gūḍhāgūḍhatvābhyāṃ dhvaniguṇībhūtavyaṅgyākhyau kāvyaprakāraviśeṣau vakṣyete /
GK16visa02cu:980: etā anantaroktāḥ ṣoḍaśabhedā lakṣaṇāḥ phalasya dharmigatatvena dharmagatatvena ca pratyekaṃ dvidhā bhūtvā dvātriṃśadbhedāḥ /
GK16visa02cu:982: “strigdhaśyāmalakāntiliptaviyato velladvalākā ghanā vātāḥ śīkariṇaḥ payodasuhṛdāmānandakekāḥ kalāḥ /
GK16visa02cu:983: kāmaṃ santu dṛḍhaṃ kaṭhorahṛdayo rāmo 'smi sarvaṃ sahe vaidehī tu kathaṃ bhaviṣyati hahā hā devi dhīrā bhava” //
GK16visa02cu:988: dharmastu lakṣyārthaniṣṭhapadārthaḥ strigdhaśyāmaleti---prāvṛṭkāle upasthite sītāvirahiṇo rāmasyeyamuktiḥ /
GK16visa02cu:990: payodasuhṛdāṃmayūrāṇām ete virahoddīpakāḥ kāmaṃ svācchandyena santu tathāpi māṃ mārayituṃ na śaktā ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa02cu:991: yato rāmo 'smi, duḥ khasahiṣṇurasmi, tathātve hetumāhakaṭhoreti /
GK16visa02cu:992: ata uktaṃ ghanādikaṃ sarvamahaṃ sahe ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa02cu:998: atrātyantaduḥkhasahiṣṇurūpe rāme dharmiṇi lakṣye tasyaivātiśayaḥ phalam /
GK16visa02cu:1003: rāme lakṣye iti---ghanādyuddīpakasaharāmatvasya prayojakatvādduḥ khasahiṣṇutvarūpeṇa rāmo lakṣyata ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa02cu:1004: tasyaivātiśaya iti tasyaiva duḥ khasahiṣṇo rāmasyātiśayaḥ vipralambharūpaḥ,
GK16visa02cu:1006: tat kathamidaṃ dharmagatasyodāharaṇaṃ na darśitamiti vācyam /
GK16visa02cu:1013: atra cātiśayitāṃśo nātiprayojanaḥ sampātāyāta eva bodhyaḥ nanvatra dharmigate śītatvapāvanatve eva prayojane kiṃ na syāditicenna /
GK16visa02cu:1015: tataśca lakṣaṇayā taṭapratītau tatsambandhinoḥ tayoḥ smaraṇasyaivaṃ sambhavena vyaṅgyatvaniyamarahitayostayoratiśaya eva prayojanamityabhiprāyāt /
GK16visa02cu:1018: snigdheti--vellanaṃ calanaṃ; payodasuhṛdāṃ mayūrāṇām; ānandena kekāḥ dhvanayaḥ kalā madhurāsphuṭāḥ /
GK16visa02cu:1020: rāmo 'haṃ sarvaṃ saha ityatra rāmasya sarvaṃsahatvasyāprasiddheḥ;
GK16visa02cu:1022: tena phalāt atyantaduḥ khasahiṣṇū rāmo 'smi iti śabdābhidhānālabhyaṃ tathābhūtarāmaviśeṣasya evātiśayastanniṣṭameva prayojanamiti /
GK16visa02cu:1037: phale dvātriṃśaditi--pūrvoktāṣṭavidhaprayojanasya gūḍhāgūḍhatvābhyāṃ draiguṇyena ṣoḍaśavidhasya dharmidharmagatatvena dvaiguṇyād dvātriṃśadityarthaḥ /
GK16visa02cu:1039: gaṅgāyāmiti--nanvidamapi ghoṣanvayavaśāt vākyameva yadi ca vākyasthaikapadasyaiva lākṣaṇikatvāttadvyaṅgyasya padagatatvaṃ tadā upakṛtaṃ bahvityatrāpi na vākyagatatvam /
GK16visa02cu:1040: upakṛtaṃ bahu tatra kimucyate iti vākyasthasyopakṛtapadasya ekasyaiva lakṣaṇikatvāditi cenna /
GK16visa02cu:1043: naca kimucyate ityantasya bhinnavākyatvāt kathaṃ tayorekavākyatvamiti vākyam,
GK16visa02cu:1047: tasmāt evamuktaprakāreṇa“upakṛtaṃ bahu tatra“ityatra bahupadaniṣṭatvābhiprāyeṇa vākyagatatvam /
GK16visa02cu:1048: evameva hi dhvaniguṇībhūtavyaṅgyadoṣaguṇālaṅkārāṇāṃ vākyaniṣṭatvam prācīnālaṅkāragranthaṣvapi prayaśo dṛśyate /
GK16visa02cu:1057_1: tisṛṣu vṛttiṣu svaṃ svamarthaṃ bodhayitvopakṣīṇāsu yathā aparo 'nyo 'nyor'tho bodhyate
GK16visa02cu:1062: etannyāyāt śabdasyeva tanniṣṭhavṛtterapi viratiḥ siddhyati ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa02cu:1069: tatrāpi lakṣaṇāyā abhāve tu prathamamate tu dvayoḥ dvitīyamate tvekasyāḥ /
GK16visa02cu:1082: tairanekārthasya śabdasya ekārthe niyantrite arthāntarabodhaṃ pratirudhya bodhite sati anyasya pratiruddhārthasya dhiyo heturyā vṛttiḥ sā vyañjanābhidhāśrayā ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa02cu:1085: (lo, ū) anekārthasya viṣṇusiṃhādyanekābhidheyaśabdasya haryyādeḥ ekārthe niyantrite ityanvayaḥ /
GK16visa02cu:1087: anyasya saṃyogādisācivyābhāvāt abhidhāyā aviṣayasya buddhihetuḥ vyañjanā /
GK16visa02cu:1099: sāhacaryyaṃ-samabhivyāhṛtapadārthena saha sarvadā sthitiḥ virodhitā vairitā sāpi tādṛśāparapadārthena saha /
GK16visa02cu:1111: etanmate tu yasya padārthasyānvayabodhastasyaiva viśeṣasya smaraṇamiti /
GK16visa02cu:1113: (lo, ṛ) uktaṃ hi bhartṛhariṇā iti śeṣaḥ /
GK16visa02cu:1138: “bhāti rathāṅgam” rathāṅgam” iti napuṃsakavyaktyā rathāṅgaṃ cakram /
GK16visa02cu:1139: svarastu veda eva viśeṣapratītikṛnna kāvya iti tasya viṣayo nodāhṛtaḥ /
GK16visa02cu:1153: naca kāmadevasyāpi kopa iti vācyam, virahiṇyāṃ kupati ityarthāt /
GK16visa02cu:1156: sāmarthye madhuneti---atra madhurdaityaviśeṣe 'pi, kokilamādane vasantasyaiva sāmarthyam /
GK16visa02cu:1170: atra vadhyaghātako virodhaḥ, sahānavasthāne tu chāyātapāviti /
GK16visa02cu:1173: kāmo na tu makarākāro dhvajaḥ, tasya koparūpadharmābhāvāt /
GK16visa02cu:1176: sānnidhyaṃ na tu vadanaṃ, tasya kāmakātaratāyogyatvābhāvāt śaśī na tu karpūram /
GK16visa02cu:1179: veda eva viśeṣapratītikṛt iti anekārthavācakaśabdasya ekārthavācakatve niyantraṇarūpaḥ,
GK16visa02cu:1180: tatpratyayaṃ ca svaro vede eva karoti /
GK16visa02cu:1181: yathā indraśatrurityādau ṣaṣṭītatpuruṣe samāsāntodāttasūcite indrasya śamīyatā vā daityo 'rirevābhidhīyate /
GK16visa02cu:1182: bahuvrīhau tu pūrvapadāntodāttanirṇote indra eva śamayitā śātayitā ceti /
GK16visa02cu:1187: udāttādirūpo 'pi muneḥ pāṭhoktadiśā śṛṅgārādirasaviśeṣapratītikṛdeva” iti etadviṣaye udāharaṇamucitameva iti, tanna; tathāhi--
GK16visa02cu:1188: svarāḥ kākkādayaḥ udāttādayo vā vyaṅgyarūpameva viśeṣaṃ pratyāyanti,
GK16visa02cu:1194: śabdārthasyānavacchede viśeṣasmṛtihetava ityatra viśeṣapadasyār'thānavabodhane iti śeṣaḥ /
GK16visa02cu:1199: muneḥ pāṭhaguṇoktamārgaśca taireva darśito yathā---“yathāha munirbharataḥ----“hasyaśṛṅgarayoḥ svarītodāttaṃ,
GK16visa02cu:1204: prakṛtoktaṃ “saṃyogo viprayogaśca'; ityādinā bharttṛhariṇā uktaṃ darśitam /
GK16visa02cu:1205: anekārthe ityādau arthaśabdo vācyaparaḥ, viśeṣa ityanantaraṃ saṃyogādiprayogāditi śeṣaḥ /
GK16visa02cu:1207: kiñca yadi yatra kvacidanekārthaśabdānāṃ prakaraṇādiniyamābhāvādaniyantritayorapyarthayoranurūpasvaravaśenaikatra niyamanaṃ vācyaṃ,
GK16visa02cu:1211: (vi, ta) muneḥ pāṭhoktadiśeti--muninā vedasya svaraviśeṣeṇaiva paṭhanāt /
GK16visa02cu:1216: ekārthaniyamane 'nyārthasya vyaṅgyatvena tasyopamānatvāt upamādhvanitvasyaiva prasakternatu śleṣasya /
GK16visa02cu:1217: yathā vakṣyamāṇe durgālaṅghitavigrahe ityādau prakaraṇādumāmahādevīvallabhabhānudevarājaniyamane pārvatīvallabhasya vyaṅgyatvena rājñaḥ tadupamādhvanireva /
GK16visa02cu:1219: na ca tathā, ata evāhuḥ śleṣanirūpaṇaprastāve--
GK16visa02cu:1225: (lo e) evaṃ pracīnoktaṃ dūṣayitvā svayameva pūrvapakṣamutpādya nirācaṣṭe-kiñceti /
GK16visa02cu:1229: yasyāhuḥ śaśimat śiro hara iti stutyaṃ ca nāmāmarāḥ
GK16visa02cu:1231: ityādau dvayorapyarthayorhariharastutiparayoranurūpaḥ svara udāttādirekatra harau hare vā /
GK16visa02cu:1237: ceṣṭādītyādiśabdena---“itaḥ sa daityaḥ prāptaśrīrneta evārhati kṣayam'; ityādau ātmanirddeśādayaḥ /
GK16visa02cu:1239: evamekasminnarthe 'bhidhayā niyantrite yā śabdārthasyānyārthabuddhihetuḥ śaktiḥ sābhidhāmūlā vyañjanā /
GK16visa02cu:1259: “durgālaṅghitavigraho manasijaṃ saṃmīlayaṃstejasā prodyadrājakalo gṛhītagarimā viṣvagvṛto bhogibhiḥ /
GK16visa02cu:1260: nakṣatreśakṛ tekṣaṇo girigurau gāḍhāṃ ruciṃ dhārayan gāmākramya vibhūtibhūṣitatanū rājatyumāvallabhaḥ” //
GK16visa02cu:1261: atra prakaraṇonābhidhayā umāvallabhaśabdasyomānāmnīmahādevīvallabhabhānudevanṛpatirūper'the niyantrite vyañjanayaiva gaurīvallabharūpor'tho bodhyate /
GK16visa02cu:1266: atra umā nāma mahādevī tasyā vallabho bhānudevanṛpatiḥ /
GK16visa02cu:1269: tejasā dehakāntyā manasijaṃ sammīlayan sāndairyyagavārta saṅkocayan /
GK16visa02cu:1273: kṣatraiśeṣu kṣatriyeśvareṣu rājasu avajñayā na kṛtekṣaṇo akṛtadṛkpātaḥ /
GK16visa02cu:1275: gāḍhāṃ ruciṃ prītiṃ dhārayan gāmākramya pṛthivīmadhikṛtya,
GK16visa02cu:1279: tathā hi--umāyāḥ pārvatyā vallabho maheśo rājati /
GK16visa02cu:1282: rājakalā candrakalā, śirasi pradyottatkaḥ gṛhītagarimā gṛhītajagadgurubhāraḥ /
GK16visa02cu:1285: girīṇāṃ gurau himālaye gāḍhāṃ ruciṃ dhārayan śvaśuratvāt svīyataponilayatvācca /
GK16visa02cu:1288: itthamatrāprākaraṇike maheśe vyañjite prakṛte saṅgamanāya maheśa iva rājetyupamāvyañjanādupamādhvanirayam /
GK16visa02cu:1297: kalā kalanāṃ aṃśaśca, garimā mahimā aiśvaryyaviśeṣaśca /
GK16visa02cu:1302: girīṇāṃ gurau, śreṣṭe ca gāṃ pṛthivīṃ vṛṣabhaṃ ca /
GK16visa02cu:1306: iha ca umāvallabhaśabdena yo 'yamaprakṛto maheśvarārthaḥ pratīyate tasyāsambaddhatvamāsīditi maheśvarabhānudevayorupamānopameyabhāvaḥ kalpyate /
GK16visa02cu:1308: ityatrai vakārasyāyamāśayaḥ-iha khalūmāvallabhaśabde yeyaṃ dvitīyārthapratītiḥ tatrābhidhāyā prakṛtārthamātrabodhane viramāt lakṣaṇāyāśca mukhyārthabodhahetukatvāt /
GK16visa02cu:1312: ataśca prathamamumāvallabhādiśabdena rājārthabodhanād viratāyāṃ prathamābhidhāyāṃ dvitīyaḥ śabdaḥ tanniṣṭābhidhāśaktyā dvitīyārthaṃ bodhayatu kiṃ vṛttyantarakalpanayā iti cenna /
GK16visa02cu:1313: atra hi śabdadvayakalpane kathaṃ prakṛtārthasya prathamaṃ pratītiranubhūyate,
GK16visa02cu:1315: evaṃ“bhramimaratim“ityādāvapi viṣaśabdasya garalārthatve bhujaṅgādipadasācivyāt na panarabhidhāyā ujjīvanaṃ,
GK16visa02cu:1319: “yena dhvastam” ityādau tu niyāmakābhāvāt anekārthaviṣayaḥ sandehaḥ“vyathāṃ dvayeṣāmapi medinībhṛtām“ityādau cobhayābhidhānamapīti caṇḍīdāsapaṇḍitāḥ /
GK16visa02cu:1323: kiñca dvitīyārthabodhane dharmikalpanāto varaṃ dharmakalpaneti bhinnaśabdakalpanāt bhinnā eva vyañjanākhyā vṛttiraṅgīkarttumucitā ;
GK16visa02cu:1324: tasyāstu yatra tatra prasare 'tiprasaṅgabhītyā sambandhatvena saivābhidhāśrīyata iti sarvamavadātam /
GK16visa02cu:1328: yayā pratyāyyate sā syādvyañjanā lakṣaṇāśrayā // VisSd_2.15 //
GK16visa02cu:1332: upāsyate ādriyate, yasya kṛte yannimittam yathā śabdaśaktyā /
GK16visa02cu:1334: “gaṅgāyāṃ ghoṣaḥ” ityādau jalamayādyarthabodhanādabhidhāyāṃ taṭādyarthabodhanācca lakṣaṇāyāṃ viratāyāṃ yayā śītatvapāvanatvādyatiśayādirbodhyate sā lakṣaṇāmūlā vyañjanā /
GK16visa02cu:1345: (lo, au) prakaraṇasaṅgatimāha evamiti--bodhyate yaḥ sa boddhavyaḥ /
GK16visa02cu:1346: śabdaprayogasya parārthatvāt, yatsamavetā pratītirupapadyate sa ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa02cu:1347: ucyate śabdena pratipādyate yaḥ sa vācyaḥ /
GK16visa02cu:1349: prastāvaḥ prakaraṇaṃ, kākuḥ dhvanervikāraḥ, vaiśiṣṭyāt vailakṣaṇyāditi vaktrādiṣu pratyekamanvayaḥ /
GK16visa02cu:1353: “kālo madhuḥ kupita eṣa ca puṣpadhanvā dhīrā vahanti ratikhedaharāḥ samīrāḥ /
GK16visa02cu:1354: kelīvanīyamapi vañjulakuñjamañjur- dūre patiḥ kathaya kiṃ karaṇīyamadya” //
GK16visa02cu:1355: atraitaṃ deśaṃ prati śīghraṃ pracchannakāmukastvayā preṣyatāmiti sakhīṃ prati kayācidvyajyate /
GK16visa02cu:1361: atra vaktryā madanavihvalatādinā vaiśiṣṭyam, vākyasya tathābhūtānubhūyamānavicchittiyuktatvena /
GK16visa02cu:1366: (vi, na) kālo madhuriti--sakhīṃ prati proṣitabharttṛkāyā uktiriyam /
GK16visa02cu:1369: īdṛśavyaṅgyabodhe kelīvanīrūpasya tatpradarśanena karaṇīyājajñāsārthakavākyasya tat vaktryā uddīpakapradarśanalabdhaśṛṅgāraprakaraṇasya madhurūpakālasya ca vailakṣaṇyaṃ hetuḥ /
GK16visa02cu:1373: “niḥ śeṣacyutacandanaṃ stanataṭaṃ nirmṛṣṭarāgo 'dharo netre dūramanañjane pulakitā tanvī taveyaṃ tanuḥ /
GK16visa02cu:1374: mithyāvādini ! dūti ! bāndhavajanasyājñātapīḍāgame vāpīṃ snātumito gatāsi na punastasyādhamasyāntikam” //
GK16visa02cu:1378: niḥ śeṣeti--upanāyakamānetuṃ preṣitāṃ yuvatiṃ tenaiva upabhuktāmāgatyāsau matprārthanayāpi nāyāta iti pratārayantīṃ dūtīṃ prati nāyikāyāḥ solluṇṭhanoktiriyam /
GK16visa02cu:1379: he matprārthanayāpi nāyāta iti mithyāvādini ! dūti ! bāndhavajanasya mama ajñātakāmapīḍāgame itaḥ strātuṃ vāpīṃ gatāsi na punastasyādhamasyāntikaṃ gatāsi /
GK16visa02cu:1384: netre ca dūramatiśayaṃ yathā syāttathānañjane jāte iti śeṣaḥ /
GK16visa02cu:1386: tathā iyaṃ tanvī kṛśā tava tanuḥ pulakitā; strānaśaityāt jātapulakā ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa02cu:1389: ( lo, ā) niḥ śeṣeti--taṭaṃ samīpaṃ, sa ca samaprayo deśaḥ /
GK16visa02cu:1395: iyaṃ tanuḥ cirakāle 'pi strāne idānīṃ pulakitā; tanvī kṣāmā ca /
GK16visa02cu:1398: atra tadantikameva rantuṃ gatāsīti viparītalakṣaṇayā lakṣyam /
GK16visa02cu:1399: tasya ca rantumiti vyaṅgyaṃ pratipādyaṃ dūtīvaiśiṣṭyādbodhyate /
GK16visa02cu:1407: tathā dūraṃ cumbanaspṛṣṭaṃ netraprāntabhāgaṃ prāpya anañjane strāne tu samastanetrasyaivānañjanatvamuktaṃ syāt /
GK16visa02cu:1408: tathā candanacyutimahinmā grīṣmakālaprāptau pulakena ca tadānīṃ snānena pulakābhāvāt /
GK16visa02cu:1409: tatā tadantikāgamane tasya doṣābhāvāt adhamatvoktyanaucityam, dūtirantṛtvenaivādhamatvopapatteśca /
GK16visa02cu:1410: atra gamanaṃ lakṣaṇayeti yaduktaṃ tat kāvyaprakāśakārasyāsammatam /
GK16visa02cu:1412: tathā hi na gatāsītyasya kāvyatvena tatra lakṣaṇāyā evābhāvāt /
GK16visa02cu:1414: padalakṣaṇā tu na sambhavatyeva gamanasya gamadhātuvācyatvādeva /
GK16visa02cu:1416: yadi ca vākye 'pi lakṣaṇā svīkriyate tathāpi na lakṣaṇā /
GK16visa02cu:1418: tathā hi candanacyavanādīnāṃ prathamaṃ snānakāryyatvenaiva pratītyā bādhānavatārāt /
GK16visa02cu:1420: atra ca vyañjanāyāḥ pravṛtternatu lakṣaṇāyā eva /
GK16visa02cu:1426: pūrvatra prathamaṃ bādhyatayā khyātau pratītau abhidhaiva tvityanena tatra lakṣaṇāyā abhāvāt /
GK16visa02cu:1431_0: eṣāṃ ca padārthānāṃ vāpīsnānaviruddhānāmanusandhānādeva vāpīsnānābhāvamātrasya prarohābhāvena
GK16visa02cu:1431_1: tadantikaṃ na gatāsītyatra viparītalakṣaṇayā gatāsīti lakṣyate ntumityataḥ pūrvaṃ tena saheti śeṣaḥ /
GK16visa02cu:1438: ataḥ saṃketasthānametaditi kayāpi saṃnihitaṃ pracchannakāmukaṃ pratyucyate /
GK16visa02cu:1442: (vi, ba) saṅketasthānamupanāyake darśayantyā dūtyā uktiriyam--ua iti /
GK16visa02cu:1449: tathā ca dyotyata ityatra dyotanaṃ sāmājikairvyañjanayā budhyata iti śeṣaḥ /
GK16visa02cu:1450: nāyakena tu balākāpradarśanarūpāt vaktryā vailakṣaṇyāt saṅketasthalaṃ vyañjanayā budhyate /
GK16visa02cu:1467: atra naiṣyati, api tarhi eṣyatyeveti kākkā vyajyate--
GK16visa02cu:1472: guruparatantratayeti--dūrataradeśagataṃ patiṃ śocayantyā nāyikāyā uktiḥ prathamārddham /
GK16visa02cu:1474: naiṣyatīti---api tveṣyatyevetyarthaḥ kākkā vyajyate iti--kākkāḥ paraṃ nañarthopasthāpanānna eṣyati eṣyatyevetyevaṃrūpaḥ /
GK16visa02cu:1482: (lo, ū) saṅketeti--hasatā vikaśatā netreṇa arpitamākūtamabhiprayoyena iti viṭaviśeṣaṇam /
GK16visa02cu:1487: atra saṃdhyā saṃketakāla iti paṅmanimīlanādiceṣṭayā kayāciddyotyate /
GK16visa02cu:1491: saṃketakāleti---viṭaṃ dhūrttam upanāyakaṃ saṃketakālamanasaṃ tajjijñāsārthaṃ tanmanaskaṃ jñātvetyarthaḥ /
GK16visa02cu:1492: hasatā netreṇārpitaṃ sthāpitam ākūtaṃ bhāvo yatra tādṛśaṃ yathā syāttathā līlāpadmaṃ nimīlitamityarthaḥ /
GK16visa02cu:1499: tatra vācyārthasya vyañjanā yathā-“kālo madhuḥ-” ityādi /
GK16visa02cu:1512: śabdārthayorekasya vyañjakatve taditaraḥ sahakārī satu avarjanīyasānnidhimātreṇāvasthitaḥ /
GK16visa02cu:1513: kintu yatra yacchaktirutkaṭā tatra tanmūlo vyañjakatvavyapadeśaḥ /
GK16visa02cu:1534: tātparyārthaṃ tadarthaṃ ca vākyaṃ tadvodhakaṃ pare // VisSd_2.20 //
GK16visa02cu:1538: na kevalaṃ vācyāditrividha eva śabdasyārtho 'pi tu vācyāditrayabhinnaḥ padārthasaṃsargo 'pi śabdārthastadbodhakaṃ ca vākyamityāha--kiṃ cetyādinā /
GK16visa02cu:1541: tadarthaṃ tasyā vṛtterviṣayarūpamarthaṃ tātparyyārthaṃ saṃsargarūpaṃ tadvodhakaṃ ca vākyamityāhuḥ /
GK16visa02cu:1543: abhidhāyā ekaikapadārthabodhanavirāmādvākyārtharūpasya padārthānvayasya bodhikā tātpaya nāma vṛttiḥ /
GK16visa02cu:1548: (vi, la) abhidhāyāḥ saṃsargabodhane 'sāmarthyaṃ darśayan vyācaṣṭe--abhidhāyā iti /
GK16visa02cu:1550: abhihitānvayavādināṃ naiyāyikānāṃ padena padārthe 'bhihite smārite tadanvayabodho vākyādeva //
GK16visa02cu:1554: ihi sāhityārpaṇo vākyasvarūpanirūpaṇo nāma dvitīyaḥ paricchedaḥ /
